divs: Sighting Detailsmy daughter,her boyfriend and i were up at the cottage for father's day and just out on the deck viewing a beautiful starry cloudless night when my daughter noticed coming over her left shoulder a craft that was saucer shaped and glowing a brilliant white, coming out of the west over black donald lake heading east...as it moved across the sky it appeard as if the object was starting to move slightly side to side or quiver as it continued to traverse a straight course when before our eyes it started to go transparent with and changed to a fading orange streak and disapeared or cloaked....the aprox height was it was flying was about a mile and as it first pass over us you could see the side,the bump on the top in middle,it was moving along pretty good but not as fast as you would think,kinda taking it's time on cruise control,definately no meteor ot asteroid,freaking amazing to see....this is my 3rd,now that i have witnesses that i'm not crazy they finally believe now.
Summary: stargazing ufo passed over our heads from behind
